verses.roman:
eta bali' prabhu-pāśe gelā śivānanda
uṭhi' tāṅre lāthi māilā prabhu nityānanda

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; prabhu-pāśe—to Nityānanda Prabhu; gelā—went; śivānanda—Śivānanda Sena; uṭhi'-standing up; tāṅre—him; lāthi māilā—kicked; prabhu—the Lord; nityānanda—Nityānanda.
translation: After saying this, Śivānanda Sena went to Nityānanda Prabhu, who then stood up and kicked him.
